name: A badly decayed torso
data: It increases the users strength unnoticably.
It increases the users dexterity unnoticably.
It increases the users constitution unnoticably.
It has almost non-existent armour class for its type (almost non-existent in general).
It increases the users spellpoint regeneration unnoticably.
It increases the users hitpoint regeneration unnoticably.
This item loses its magical powers with average speed.
